html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Job Offer

html:
Purchase Order
{{doc.name}}

{{doc.supplier_name}}
{% if doc.address_display %}
{{doc.address_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.contact_display %}
{{doc.contact_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.contact_mobile %}
{{doc.contact_mobile}}
{%- endif -%}
{{doc.transaction_date}}
{{doc.customer_name}}
{% if doc.shipping_address_display %}
{{doc.shipping_address_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.customer_contact_display %}
{{doc.customer_contact_display}}
{%- endif -%} {% if doc.customer_contact_mobile %}
{{doc.customer_contact_mobile}}
{%- endif -%}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Name Description Qty Rate Amount
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_name }} {% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
Item Code: {{ row.item_code}} {%- endif %}
{{ row.description }}
 {{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }} {{ row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{doc.total}}
{{doc.grand_total}}
{{doc.in_words}}
name: Drop Shipping Format

html:
{{ company }}
{{ __("POS No : ") }} {{ offline_pos_name }}

{{ __("Customer") }}: {{ customer }}

{{ __("Date") }}: {{ dateutil.global_date_format(posting_date) }}

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
{{ __("Item") }} {{ __("Qty") }} {{ __("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_name }} {{ format_number(item.qty, null,precision("difference")) }}
@ {{ format_currency(item.rate, currency) }}		 {{ format_currency(item.amount, currency) }}
{% for row in taxes %} {% if not row.included_in_print_rate %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if discount_amount %} {% endif %}
{{ __("Net Total") }} {{ format_currency(total, currency) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ format_currency(row.tax_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Discount") }} {{ format_currency(discount_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Grand Total") }} {{ format_currency(grand_total, currency) }}
{{ __("Paid Amount") }} {{ format_currency(paid_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Qty Total") }} {{ qty_total }}

{{ terms }}

{{ __("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: Point of Sale

ID Number: {{doc.employee}} Department: {{doc.department}} Position: {{doc.designation}}
Date Joined: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(employee_doc.date_of_joining) }} Leave Taken: {{doc.leave_without_pay}} Leave Balance: {{doc.total_working_days - doc.leave_without_pay}}
Loan: 0.0 NSSA No: {{employee_doc.custom_nssa_no}} Medical Aid No: {{employee_doc.custom_medical_no}}
Bank: {{doc.bank_name}} Branch: {{doc.bank_name}} Account Number: {{doc.bank_account_no}}
{% set additional_salary_docs = [] %} {% set medical_deductions = namespace(value=0) %} {% set max_length = [doc.earnings|length, doc.deductions|length] | max %} {% set total_earnings = namespace(value=0) %} {% set total_deductions = namespace(value=0) %} {% for index in range(max_length) %} {% if index < doc.earnings|length %} {% if doc.earnings[index].additional_salary %} {% set additional_salary_doc = frappe.get_doc("Additional Salary", doc.earnings[index].additional_salary) %} {% set _ = additional_salary_docs.append(additional_salary_doc) %} {% set total_earnings.value = total_earnings.value + additional_salary_doc.amount %} {% else %} {% set total_earnings.value = total_earnings.value + doc.earnings[index].amount %} {% endif %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% if index < doc.deductions|length %} {% if doc.deductions[index].additional_salary %} {% set additional_salary_doc = frappe.get_doc("Additional Salary", doc.deductions[index].additional_salary) %} {% set _ = additional_salary_docs.append(additional_salary_doc) %} {% set total_deductions.value = total_deductions.value + additional_salary_doc.amount %} {% if "MEDICAL" in doc.deductions[index].salary_component %} {% set medical_deductions.value = medical_deductions.value + additional_salary_doc.amount %} {% endif %} {% else %} {% set total_deductions.value = total_deductions.value + doc.deductions[index].amount %} {% if "MEDICAL" in doc.deductions[index].salary_component %} {% set medical_deductions.value = medical_deductions.value + doc.deductions[index].amount %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Earnings Amount ({{doc.currency}}) Deductions Amount ({{doc.currency}})
{{ doc.earnings[index].salary_component }}({{ additional_salary_doc.custom_amount_currency | round(2) }} {{additional_salary_doc.currency}}) {{ additional_salary_doc.amount | round(2) }}{{ doc.earnings[index].amount | round(2) }} {{ doc.deductions[index].salary_component }}({{ additional_salary_doc.custom_amount_currency | round(2) }} {{additional_salary_doc.currency}}) {{ additional_salary_doc.amount | round(2) }}{{ doc.deductions[index].amount | round(2) }}

{% endif %} {% endif %} {% set tax_credit = medical_deductions.value * 0.5 %}
